躍升.definition: to leap to (a higher position etc); to jump; (of a plane) to ascend

躍然.definition: to show forth; to appear as a vivid image; to stand out markedly

躍然紙上.definition: to appear vividly on paper (idiom); to show forth vividly (in writing, painting etc); to stand out markedly

躍躍欲試.definition: to be eager to give sth a try (idiom)

躍進.definition: to leap forward; to make rapid progress; a leap forward

躍遷.definition: transition; jump (e.g. quantum leap in spectroscopy)

躍馬.definition: to gallop; to spur on a horse; to let one's steed have his head
